byooption.longDescription: Purchase this BMW Ultimate Care upgrade to add: *Replacement of specific wear-and-tear items such as brake pads, wiper blades and manual transmission clutch (for model year 2017 vehicles and newer). * Ultimate Care+ is transferable to a subsequent owner, should you sell your vehicle.  Price - $600 across the board for all 2017 model/series.  Legal Disclaimer:  Visit bmwusa.com/ultimatecare for details. For model year 2015 or later vehicles sold or leased by an authorized BMW Center on or after July 1, 2014, BMW Ultimate Care coverage is not transferable to subsequent purchasers, owners, or lessees. Please see bmwusa.com/ultimatecare or ask your authorized BMW Center for details.  Certain restrictions apply when purchasing coverage once your previous coverage period has ended. Limitations or additional fees may apply.
byooption.name: BMW Ultimate Care+

accessories.name: BMW Ultimate Care+

byooption.disclaimer:
BMW Ultimate Care+ and BMW Ultimate Care+1 Bundle

Purchase BMW Ultimate Care+ to add:

▪ Replacement of specific wear-and-tear items such as brake pads, wiper blades and manual transmission clutch (for model
year 2017 vehicles and newer).

▪ Ultimate Care+ is transferable to a subsequent owner, should you sell your vehicle.

With purchasing this bundle, you will also extend your coverage with BMW Ultimate Care+1 for an additional 1 year or 14,000 miles for a total of 4 years or 50,000 miles.


Price: BMW UC+ $600 + BMW UC+1 price (which differs per 2017 model/series)
See attached price sheet


Legal Disclaimer:

Visit bmwusa.com/ultimatecare for details. For model year 2015 or later vehicles sold or leased by an authorized BMW Center on or after July 1, 2014, BMW Ultimate Care coverage is not transferable to subsequent purchasers, owners, or lessees. Please see bmwusa.com/ultimatecare or ask your authorized BMW Center for details.

Certain restrictions apply when purchasing coverage once your previous coverage period has ended. Limitations or additional fees may apply.

byooption.disclaimer: Each price is the suggested retail price and is subject to change. Price excludes installation and taxes.
byooption.longDescription: The BMW iPad Holder is an attractive way to facilitate the use of an iPad in the vehicle. It provides a secure way to utilize these devices while in the rear seat of your BMW. This product is used in conjunction with our sturdy base carrier, which utilizes a modular plug connector. The holder can be easily clipped into the frame of the holder, which rotates 360° (optimal for watching films, viewing photos, composing e-mails, Facebook, Twitter, etc). Not for vehicles equipped with optional factory rear seat entertainment or optional sport seats.
byooption.name: BMW iPad Holder

accessories.description: The BMW iPad Holder is an attractive way to facilitate the use of an iPad in the vehicle. The holder can be easily clipped into the frame of the holder, which rotates 360° (optimal for watching films, viewing photos, composing e-mails, Facebook, Twitter, etc). Not for vehicles equipped with optional factory rear seat entertainment or optional sport seats.

byoConfiguration.leaseOfferDisclaimer:
Offer not valid in Puerto Rico. Lease financing available on new 2018 BMW 740i Sedan models from participating BMW Centers through BMW Financial Services through July 31, 2017, to eligible, qualified customers with excellent credit history who meet BMW Financial Services' credit requirements.

Monthly lease payments of $1,059 per month for 36 months is based on an adjusted capitalized cost of $79,246 (MSRP of $85,795, including destination and handling fee of $995, less $5,500 customer down, $0 security deposit and suggested dealer contribution of $1,049).  Actual MSRP may vary.  Dealer contribution may vary and could affect your actual lease payment.  Cash due at signing includes $5,500 down payment, $1,059 first month's payment, $925 acquisition fee and $0 security deposit.  Lessee responsible for insurance during the lease term, excess wear and tear as defined in the lease contract, $0.30/mile over 22,500 miles and a disposition fee of $350 at lease end.  Not all customers will qualify for security deposit waiver.  Tax, title, license and registration fees are additional fees due at signing.  Advertised payment does not include applicable taxes.  Purchase option at lease end, excluding tax, title and government fees, is $48,045.

Offer valid through July 31, 2017 and may be combined with other offers unless otherwise stated.  Models pictured may be shown with metallic paint and/or additional accessories.  Visit your authorized BMW Center for important details.

©2017 BMW of North America, LLC. The BMW name, model names and logo are registered trademarks.

byooption.longDescription: Multi-contour front seats for the driver and front passenger provide optimum lateral support. The seats offer power adjustment for backrest and seat bottom angle; forward/backward and up/down position; thigh, upper back and lumbar support; adjustable sides; and active head restraints.
byooption.name: Multi-contour seats

conflictAddOptions.description: Multi-contour front seats for the driver and front passenger provide optimum lateral support. conflictAddOptions.name: Multi-contour seats

byooption.longDescription: Integral Active Steering enhances driving dynamics at high speeds and driving comfort at low speeds. At lower speeds, a small turn of the steering wheel yields a bigger turning radius for the front wheels for easier parking and cornering. At higher speeds, the steering becomes less direct and the rear wheels are also capable of turning, which helps improve vehicle stability and allows you to make precise handling movements.
byooption.name: Integral Active Steering

options.description: Integral Active Steering enhances driving dynamics at high speeds and driving comfort at low speeds. At lower speeds, a small turn of the steering wheel yields a bigger turning radius for the front wheels for easier parking and cornering. At higher speeds, the steering becomes less direct and the rear wheels are also capable of turning, which helps improve vehicle stability and allows you to make precise handling movements.
options.name: Integral Active Steering

byooption.longDescription: The wooden inlay steering wheel adds an extra touch of elegance to the cabin of the 7 Series.  Gloss painted wood inserts are integrated with the leather on the inside rim of the wheel.
byooption.name: Wood inlay leather steering wheel

options.description: The wooden inlay steering wheel adds an extra touch of elegance to the cabin of the 7 Series.  Gloss painted wood inserts are integrated with the leather on the inside rim of the wheel.
options.name: Wood inlay leather steering wheel

byooption.longDescription: As a dramatic aesthetic innovation, the Panoramic Sky Lounge LED Roof enhances the generous dimensions of the new 7 Series’ standard dual-panel Panoramic moonroof while adding a subtly elegant LED light pattern. This lighting is selectable in a choice of six colors via iDrive: white, blue, orange, bronze, lilac and green.\n
byooption.name: Panoramic Sky Lounge LED Roof

options.description: As a dramatic aesthetic innovation, the Panoramic Sky Lounge LED Roof enhances the generous dimensions of the new 7 Series’ standard dual-panel Panoramic moonroof while adding a subtly elegant LED light pattern. This lighting is selectable in a choice of six colors via iDrive: white, blue, orange, bronze, lilac and green.\n
options.name: Panoramic Sky Lounge LED Roof

byooption.longDescription: A system of ionization and scents, controllable in three stages via iDrive or a dedicated button on the climate-control panel. Scents are drawn from cartridges; easily installed in the glove compartment. Cartridges are available in a selection of several fragrances: Blue Suite (fresh-water scents), Green Suite (fresh-plant scents), Golden Suite (warm and rich scents) and Authentic Suite (natural vehicle scent).
byooption.name: Ambient Air Package

options.description: A system of ionization and scents, controllable in three stages via iDrive or a dedicated button on the climate-control panel. Scents are drawn from cartridges; easily installed in the glove compartment. Cartridges are available in a selection of several fragrances: Blue Suite (fresh-water scents), Green Suite (fresh-plant scents), Golden Suite (warm and rich scents) and Authentic Suite (natural vehicle scent).
options.name: Ambient Air Package

byooption.longDescription: Relieve stress and tension on long trips with eight (8) massage units, each with 3 levels of intensity.  Provides relaxation and muscle activation for torso, shoulder, back, full-body and more.
byooption.name: Front massaging seats

byooption.disclaimer: Apple CarPlay is a trademark of Apple Inc. CarPlay is compatible with iPhone 5 and later, and iOS 9.3 and later.  For best results, please use the most recent version of iOS.  Further information can be found at https://www.apple.com/ios/carplay/ Apple is responsible for all content and functionality which is displayed in the vehicle via Apple CarPlay.
byooption.longDescription: Available as part of BMW ConnectedDrive®, Apple CarPlay™ seamlessly integrates your iPhone to BMW's iDrive system. Messages, calls, Apple Maps and music are shown on the center Display just as they appear on your iPhone, allowing you to stay focused on the road.  Note: Requires iDrive 5.0 and BMW Navigation system.
byooption.name: Apple CarPlay Compatibility

options.description: Available as part of BMW ConnectedDrive®, Apple CarPlay™ seamlessly integrates your iPhone to BMW's iDrive system. Messages, calls, Apple Maps and music are shown on the center Display just as they appear on your iPhone, allowing you to stay focused on the road.  Note: Requires iDrive 5.0 and BMW Navigation system.
options.disclaimer: Apple CarPlay is a trademark of Apple Inc. CarPlay is compatible with iPhone 5 and later, and iOS 9.3 and later.  For best results, please use the most recent version of iOS.  Further information can be found at https://www.apple.com/ios/carplay/ Apple is responsible for all content and functionality which is displayed in the vehicle via Apple CarPlay.
options.name: Apple CarPlay Compatibility

byooption.longDescription: Diamond Surround Sound System has it all: 16 speakers - including exclusive Diamond Dome tweeters, 1400 watts of audio power, 10 fully active amplification channels, QuantumLogic Surround/Dynamic Sound Equalizing via measuring microphone and three analog crossover networks for consistent sound quality at all seating positions.
byooption.name: Bowers & Wilkins Diamond Surround Sound System

options.description: Diamond Surround Sound System has it all: 16 speakers - including exclusive Diamond Dome tweeters, 1400 watts of audio power, 10 fully active amplification channels, QuantumLogic Surround/Dynamic Sound Equalizing via measuring microphone and three analog crossover networks for consistent sound quality at all seating positions.
options.name: Bowers & Wilkins Diamond Surround Sound System

byooption.longDescription: Surrounded in comfort, rear-seat passengers can relax in style and dial up their favorite music or shows with the rear-seat iDrive controller.
byooption.name: Rear-seat entertainment Professional

options.description: Surrounded in comfort, rear-seat passengers can relax in style and dial up their favorite music or shows with the rear-seat iDrive controller.
options.name: Rear-seat entertainment Professional

byooption.longDescription: Optional M Sport brakes features 4-piston aluminum fixed calipers in the front, 2-piston aluminum fixed calipers in the rear, lightweight discs and high-performance brake pads to further shorten stopping distances, increase durability and reduce weight. For a sporty touch, the calipers are painted blue with an "M" logo on them. Wheel styles may vary by model and line. Please visit your local BMW Center for details.
byooption.name: M Sport Brakes

byooption.longDescription: NOTE:  Please be advised these wheels come with low profile tires, which reduce comfort and cushioning between the wheel and road.  This can lead to increased risk of rim, tire, and suspension damage when driving over damaged road surfaces such as potholes.
byooption.name: 20" M Light alloy Double-Spoke Bi-Color wheels with performance run-flat tires

conflictAddOptions.description: NOTE:  Please be advised these wheels come with low profile tires, which reduce comfort and cushioning between the wheel and road.  This can lead to increased risk of rim, tire, and suspension damage when driving over damaged road surfaces such as potholes.
conflictAddOptions.name: 20" M Light alloy Double-Spoke Bi-Color wheels with performance run-flat tires

byooption.longDescription: Underscore your BMW’s "driving machine" personality with M Sport. You’ll feel the difference when you grip the thick Sport steering wheel; you’ll see the difference the Aerodynamic kit, shadowline trim and special headliner make.

byooption.longDescription: Active Driving Assistant is comprised of 4 active safety features: Lane Departure Warning, Frontal Collision Warning, City Collision Mitigation, and Pedestrian Protection. This camera- based system helps prevent or reduce the severity of pedestrian and automotive collisions by using a combination of driver alerts and automatically priming and/or activating the brakes.
byooption.name: Active Driving Assistant

options.description: Active Driving Assistant is comprised of 4 active safety features: Lane Departure Warning, Frontal Collision Warning, City Collision Mitigation, and Pedestrian Protection. This camera- based system helps prevent or reduce the severity of pedestrian and automotive collisions by using a combination of driver alerts and automatically priming and/or activating the brakes.

byooption.longDescription: Remote Control Parking flawlessly parks you in tight spots. With a simple touch of the Display Key, the 7 Series will pull itself in and out of parking spots. While parking it brakes for pedestrians and other vehicles, keeping everyone safe and eliminating the possibility of scratches.
byooption.name: Remote Control Parking

byooption.longDescription: BMW Parking Assistant searches for a parking space, and does the parking for you at the drop of a command.  Ultrasonic sensors in the side indicators search for availability when traveling at speeds of up to 22 mph. Blue arrows indicate if parking is available on the left or right side of the road, while also taking care of steering, accelerating and braking as you select the correct gear.
byooption.name: Parking Assistant

conflictAddOptions.description: BMW Parking Assistant searches for a parking space, and does the parking for you at the drop of a command.  Ultrasonic sensors in the side indicators search for availability when traveling at speeds of up to 22 mph. Blue arrows indicate if parking is available on the left or right side of the road, while also taking care of steering, accelerating and braking as you select the correct gear.
conflictAddOptions.name: Parking Assistant

byooption.longDescription: Images from the four cameras are combined with 3D computer graphics to form an enhanced all-around viewing for drivers. Top View and 3D views are shown next to each other on the iDrive display for an even better overview when parking. Drivers can select from prescribed Side, Rear and Top Views, or freely range among them. An additional view for car-wash entries is also available.
byooption.name: Surround View Cameras

conflictAddOptions.description: Images from the four cameras are combined with 3D computer graphics to form an enhanced all-around viewing for drivers. Top View and 3D views are shown next to each other on the iDrive display for an even better overview when parking. Drivers can select from prescribed Side, Rear and Top Views, or freely range among them. An additional view for car-wash entries is also available.
conflictAddOptions.name: Surround View Cameras

byooption.longDescription: Make parking a breeze with the Parking Assistant Package. A Rear view camera lets you see clearly behind the vehicle, while Park Distance Control provides visual and audio warnings as you approach an object.
byooption.name: Parking Assistance Package

conflictAddOptions.description: Make parking a breeze with the Parking Assistant Package. A Rear view camera lets you see clearly behind the vehicle, while Park Distance Control provides visual and audio warnings as you approach an object.
conflictAddOptions.name: Parking Assistance Package

options.description: Remote Control Parking flawlessly parks you in tight spots. With a simple touch of the Display Key, the 7 Series will pull itself in and out of parking spots. While parking it brakes for pedestrians and other vehicles, keeping everyone safe and eliminating the possibility of scratches.
options.name: Remote Control Parking

byooption.disclaimer: Under optimal road conditions.  Night vision performance is also limited by rain, fog, humidity and other weather conditions.
byooption.longDescription: Night Vision uses state-of-the-art infrared technology combined with black-and-white imaging to see things before they are visible to the naked eye.  Using a thermal imaging camera mounted in the lower air dam, Night Vision recognizes people, animals, and objects based upon the heat they emit. The warmer the object, the brighter it illuminates on the iDrive display monitor.  The Pedestrian Detection feature recognizes and indicates individual pedestrians on or near the roadway at a range up to 330 feet. The system only works during night hours, and it must be cooler than 95-degrees Fahrenheit.
byooption.name: Night Vision with Pedestrian Detection

options.description: Night Vision uses state-of-the-art infrared technology combined with black-and-white imaging to see things before they are visible to the naked eye.  Using a thermal imaging camera mounted in the lower air dam, Night Vision recognizes people, animals, and objects based upon the heat they emit. The warmer the object, the brighter it illuminates on the iDrive display monitor.  The Pedestrian Detection feature recognizes and indicates individual pedestrians on or near the roadway at a range up to 330 feet. The system only works during night hours, and it must be cooler than 95-degrees Fahrenheit.
options.disclaimer: Under optimal road conditions.  Night vision performance is also limited by rain, fog, humidity and other weather conditions.
options.name: Night Vision with Pedestrian Detection

byooption.longDescription: Autobahn Package combines the best optional performance features for superior vehicle dynamics.  Active Comfort Drive with Road Preview, Active Roll Stabilization and Integral Active Steering provide stability, handling and overall performance improvements for the road ahead.  Painted black brake calipers add a sporty look to the exterior.
byooption.name: Autobahn Package

packages.description: Autobahn Package combines the best optional performance features for superior vehicle dynamics.  Active Comfort Drive with Road Preview, Active Roll Stabilization and Integral Active Steering provide stability, handling and overall performance improvements for the road ahead.  Painted black brake calipers add a sporty look to the exterior.
packages.name: Autobahn Package

byooption.longDescription: Integral Active Steering enhances driving dynamics at high speeds and driving comfort at low speeds. At lower speeds, a small turn of the steering wheel yields a bigger turning radius for the front wheels for easier parking and cornering. At higher speeds, the steering becomes less direct and the rear wheels are also capable of turning, which helps improve vehicle stability and allows you to make precise handling movements.
byooption.name: Integral Active Steering

options.description: Integral Active Steering enhances driving dynamics at high speeds and driving comfort at low speeds. At lower speeds, a small turn of the steering wheel yields a bigger turning radius for the front wheels for easier parking and cornering. At higher speeds, the steering becomes less direct and the rear wheels are also capable of turning, which helps improve vehicle stability and allows you to make precise handling movements.
options.name: Integral Active Steering

byooption.longDescription: Active Comfort Drive's electromechanically operated stabilization system allows your vehicle to handle corners with comfort and precision, while Road Preview's interior camera enables the Dynamic Damper Control system to react pro-actively to road irregularities. Together, Active Comfort Drive and Road Preview impart an unrivaled combination of sporty handling and luxurious riding comfort that must be experienced to be believed.\n
byooption.name: Active Comfort Drive with Road Preview

options.description: Active Comfort Drive's electromechanically operated stabilization system allows your vehicle to handle corners with comfort and precision, while Road Preview's interior camera enables the Dynamic Damper Control system to react pro-actively to road irregularities. Together, Active Comfort Drive and Road Preview impart an unrivaled combination of sporty handling and luxurious riding comfort that must be experienced to be believed.\n
options.name: Active Comfort Drive with Road Preview

byooption.longDescription: Winter driving fun should not go down with the thermometer. The Cold Weather Package adds heat settings to the front and rear seats and welcome warmth to the steering wheel.
byooption.name: Cold Weather Package

packages.description: Winter driving fun should not go down with the thermometer. The Cold Weather Package adds heat settings to the front and rear seats and welcome warmth to the steering wheel.
packages.name: Cold Weather Package

byooption.longDescription: Heated steering wheel makes gloves unnecessary for cold weather driving.  A flick of the switch quickly warms the steering wheel to the perfect temperature.
byooption.name: Heated Steering Wheel

options.description: Heated steering wheel makes gloves unnecessary for cold weather driving.  A flick of the switch quickly warms the steering wheel to the perfect temperature.
options.name: Heated Steering Wheel

byooption.longDescription: Passengers front and rear are offered three levels of seating warmth. At the touch of a button, seat cushions and backrests are quickly heated to each individual's preferred setting.
byooption.name: Front and Rear Heated Seats

byooption.longDescription: The Driver Assistance Package is like having another set of eyes in the back of your head. Switch into reverse and everything behind your vehicle is shown on the Display screen. It also makes parallel parking a breeze; simply follow the lines on the screen that guide you into your spot.
byooption.name: Driving Assistance Package

packages.description: The Driver Assistance Package is like having another set of eyes in the back of your head. Switch into reverse and everything behind your vehicle is shown on the Display screen. It also makes parallel parking a breeze; simply follow the lines on the screen that guide you into your spot.
packages.name: Driving Assistance Package

byooption.longDescription: OK to change lanes? With this feature, a warning triangle in your side-view mirror lights up if there’s a vehicle in your blind spot or approaching at a high speed. If you then start to cross lanes, you will feel a slight shimmy in your steering wheel - a secondary caution to remain in your lane.
byooption.name: Active Blind Spot Detection

options.description: OK to change lanes? With this feature, a warning triangle in your side-view mirror lights up if there’s a vehicle in your blind spot or approaching at a high speed. If you then start to cross lanes, you will feel a slight shimmy in your steering wheel - a secondary caution to remain in your lane.
options.name: Active Blind Spot Detection

byooption.longDescription: The Head-up Display projects a multi-color image that seems to float beyond the windshield, just below your line of vision. It allows you to monitor preferred travel information, such as current speed, BMW Navigation system directional arrows, posted Speed Limit, Check Control data and more - without taking your eyes off the road.  Some features, such as Speed Limit Info and Navigation, may be optional equipment.
byooption.name: Head-up Display

options.description: The Head-up Display projects a multi-color image that seems to float beyond the windshield, just below your line of vision. It allows you to monitor preferred travel information, such as current speed, BMW Navigation system directional arrows, posted Speed Limit, Check Control data and more - without taking your eyes off the road.  Some features, such as Speed Limit Info and Navigation, may be optional equipment.
options.name: Head-up Display

byooption.longDescription: Employing a camera near the interior rearview mirror, this system monitors road lane markings. When LDW is switched on, anytime the vehicle begins to move across a lane marking without the turn signals activated, this system vibrates the steering wheel. If the driver does activate the turn signals, LDW does not react. Correct operation is predicated on clear lane markings that are not obscured by rain, snow or other masking factors.
byooption.name: Lane Departure Warning

options.description: Employing a camera near the interior rearview mirror, this system monitors road lane markings. When LDW is switched on, anytime the vehicle begins to move across a lane marking without the turn signals activated, this system vibrates the steering wheel. If the driver does activate the turn signals, LDW does not react. Correct operation is predicated on clear lane markings that are not obscured by rain, snow or other masking factors.
options.name: Lane Departure Warning

byooption.longDescription: Active Cruise Control with Stop & Go maintains your selected speed; it also uses radar to keep your preselected distance from the vehicle ahead and bring your vehicle to a complete stop, if needed - a useful feature in stop-and-go traffic. Also included is Collision Mitigation: if the vehicle ahead suddenly brakes, you are alerted and, if necessary, the brakes quickly engage.  \n\nActive Driving Assistant is comprised of 4 active safety features: Lane Departure Warning, Frontal Collision Warning, City Collision Mitigation, and Pedestrian Protection. These camera- and radar-based systems help prevent or reduce the severity of pedestrian and automotive collisions by using a combination of driver alerts and automatically priming and/or activating the brakes.
byooption.name: Active Driving Assistant Plus

Also included is Collision Mitigation: if the vehicle ahead suddenly brakes, you are alerted and, if necessary, the brakes quickly engage.  \n\nActive Driving Assistant is comprised of 4 active safety features: Lane Departure Warning, Frontal Collision Warning, City Collision Mitigation, and Pedestrian Protection. These camera- and radar-based systems help prevent or reduce the severity of pedestrian and automotive collisions by using a combination of driver alerts and automatically priming and/or activating the brakes.
options.name: Active Driving Assistant Plus

byooption.longDescription: Traffic Jam Assistant is a semi-automated driving feature that provides comfort-enhancing steering assistance whenever the driver has at least one hand on the steering wheel.  When the assistant is activated, you will not be required to make potentially tiring, small, incremental steering adjustments while sitting in slow traffic.
byooption.name: Traffic Jam Assistant

options.description: Traffic Jam Assistant is a semi-automated driving feature that provides comfort-enhancing steering assistance whenever the driver has at least one hand on the steering wheel.  When the assistant is activated, you will not be required to make potentially tiring, small, incremental steering adjustments while sitting in slow traffic.
options.name: Traffic Jam Assistant

byooption.longDescription: This function actively keeps the vehicle in the center of the lane by providing active steering input when the vehicle starts to drift off-course. If a vehicle beside yours starts to veer too close, Side Collision Prevention's steering input will tug you away from a potential side collision.
byooption.name: Active Lane Keeping Assistant w/ side collision avoidance

byooption.longDescription: The Luxury Rear Seating Package immerses rear-seat passengers in spa-like levels of comfort. Multi-adjustable rear Comfort seats offer both Active Ventilation and a relaxing massage feature. Using a 7-inch Touch Command Tablet, rear passengers can personalize interior climate, Ambiance lighting, audio, seating and more. The driver is also rewarded with the comfort of a heated steering wheel, while all occupants, front and rear, enjoy three-level heated seats and heated armrests.

byooption.longDescription: Offer power-adjustable bliss for two rear-seat passengers.  Individually adjustable backrests can be angled; move the seats back to increase the already ample legroom; headrests can also be adjusted up or down and a center console adds the convenience of cupholders with a storage compartment.
byooption.name: Rear comfort seats

options.description: Offer power-adjustable bliss for two rear-seat passengers.  Individually adjustable backrests can be angled; move the seats back to increase the already ample legroom; headrests can also be adjusted up or down and a center console adds the convenience of cupholders with a storage compartment.
options.name: Rear comfort seats

byooption.longDescription: Rear massaging seats comfort the rear seat passengers with eight massage programs including two Vitality Programs.
byooption.name: Rear massaging seats

options.description: Rear massaging seats comfort the rear seat passengers with eight massage programs including two Vitality Programs.
options.name: Rear massaging seats

byooption.longDescription: Rear ventilated seats extend climate-controlled comfort to seating. In the rear-seat cushions and backrests, fans gently blow warmed or cooled air through microperforations in the leather upholstery, helping to keep rear-seat passengers supremely comfortable in any weather.
byooption.name: Rear ventilated seats

byooption.longDescription: Full-body aerodynamic kit emphasizes the dynamic appearance.  The body-color front and rear bumpers and side skirts underscore the purposeful look, while shadowline trim adds a sporty touch.

byooption.longDescription: Make parking a breeze with the Parking Assistant Package. A Rear view camera lets you see clearly behind the vehicle, while Park Distance Control provides visual and audio warnings as you approach an object.
byooption.name: Parking Assistance Package

packages.description: Make parking a breeze with the Parking Assistant Package. A Rear view camera lets you see clearly behind the vehicle, while Park Distance Control provides visual and audio warnings as you approach an object.
packages.name: Parking Assistance Package

byooption.longDescription: Images from the four cameras are combined with 3D computer graphics to form an enhanced all-around viewing for drivers. Top View and 3D views are shown next to each other on the iDrive display for an even better overview when parking. Drivers can select from prescribed Side, Rear and Top Views, or freely range among them. An additional view for car-wash entries is also available.
byooption.name: Surround View Cameras

options.description: Images from the four cameras are combined with 3D computer graphics to form an enhanced all-around viewing for drivers. Top View and 3D views are shown next to each other on the iDrive display for an even better overview when parking. Drivers can select from prescribed Side, Rear and Top Views, or freely range among them. An additional view for car-wash entries is also available.
options.name: Surround View Cameras

byooption.longDescription: BMW Parking Assistant searches for a parking space, and does the parking for you at the drop of a command.  Ultrasonic sensors in the side indicators search for availability when traveling at speeds of up to 22 mph. Blue arrows indicate if parking is available on the left or right side of the road, while also taking care of steering, accelerating and braking as you select the correct gear.
byooption.name: Parking Assistant
